description: LunLun is a young orphan who lives with her grandparents who own a flower shop. On the day of Lunlun`s 12th birthday she meets a talking dog and cat pair, Cateau and Nouveau. They were sent to Earth to find a person who truly knew the meaning of love and kindness, to find a magical flower, the symbol of the Flower Star`s ruling family, so that a new ruler could ascend the throne. Together they started travelling all over Europe in search of the flower, helping people every step of the way.
name: Lunlun
